description: ORDER ON MOTION IN LIMINE Defendants' Response to Show Cause Order and Motion for Leave to Correct Filing [Doc. 311 ] is respectfully DENIED only insofar as Defendants ask to file a different version of the Response for the Court's consideration. Plaintiff's Motion in Limine [Doc. 279 ] is GRANTED in part and DENIED in part. Plaintiff's Motion is DENIED to the extent Defendants wish to cross-examine Plaintiff about his alleged false statements regarding his involvement in the September 2021 motor vehicle accident, and GRANTED as to the original and altered body-camera footage, as well as any other testimony about the accident. Plaintiff's Motion is GRANTED with respect to Dr. Coomer's:(a) sex life;(b) drug and alcohol use;(c) religious beliefs;(d) opinions about Black Lives Matter, law enforcement, and related issues; and(e) Facebook posts about Texans, Jonathan Sackler, and past Halloween costumesPlaintiff's Motion is DENIED with respect to his Facebook posts expressing opinions about President Trump. Plaintiff's Motion is DENIED without prejudice as to other unspecified Facebook posts. Plaintiff's Motion is GRANTED as to the "Eric Coomer: Pawn, Plant or Perp?" document. By Judge Nina Y. Wang on 5/9/2025.(norlin, ) (Entered: 05/09/2025)

description: ORDERED that Kiras Motion for a Temporary Restraining Order (Dkt. No.  6 ) is GRANTED. ORDERED that Samman is enjoined from working for DeepJudge while this Order remains in effect, as outlined in Fed. R. Civ. P. 65(b)(2). ORDERED that Kiras Motion f or Leave of Court to Conduct Expedited Discovery (Dkt. No.  9 ) and Sammans request to conduct reciprocal discovery are GRANTED. ORDERED that Kira and Samman shall file by July 24, 2023 at 5:00 p.m. a joint proposed discovery schedule to include the  date for a hearing on the motion for preliminary injunction.ORDERED that Plaintiffs Motion to Seal Documents (Dkt. No.  11 ) is GRANTED and Exhibits N-W shall be placed under seal.  Signed by District Judge Michael S Nachmanoff on 7/21/2023. (lcre, )
